Lambda School (YC S17). Full-time and part-time. Computer Science instructor, JavaScript instructor, Data Science lead instructor, evenings JavaScript instructor. REMOTE.

Lambda School trains people to be software engineers and data scientists for free in live, online classes, in exchange for a share of their future income for two years.

We are passionate about finding and training untapped (often underrepresented) talent, and connecting them with the highest paying jobs in the world. You’ll work with instructors from Apple, NASA, MIT, and teach incredibly sharp people that are being given a shot. It’s incredibly rewarding work.

We’re a small team of 14 people backed by the best investors in Silicon Valley and close to profitable (we’ll be wildly profitable soon.

More info: https://LambdaSchool.com/about

Email resumes to careers@lambdaschool.com. We respond to everyone.
